vocabulary.translation: An electronic device for processing and storing data
vocabulary.example: I use my computer for work and study.
vocabulary.exampleTranslation: Describing a device for digital tasks

vocabulary.translation: A device used to communicate with others by voice
vocabulary.example: I'll call you on my phone later.

vocabulary.translation: A device that receives and displays broadcast programs
vocabulary.example: We watch the news on television.
vocabulary.exampleTranslation: Describing a device for viewing shows

vocabulary.translation: A global network connecting computers worldwide
vocabulary.example: I found the information on the internet.

vocabulary.translation: A collection of web pages on the internet
vocabulary.example: Visit our website for more details.
vocabulary.exampleTranslation: Directing someone to an online location

vocabulary.translation: Electronic mail sent over the internet
vocabulary.example: Send me an email with the information.

vocabulary.translation: Software that runs on a computer or device
The display surface of a device showing images and text
vocabulary.example: The screen on my phone is cracked.

vocabulary.translation: A software application, especially on a mobile device
vocabulary.example: Download this app to track your fitness.
